Title: ğŸ“£ğŸŒ[ANN] A Vaping Industry Powered by BlockchainğŸ“£ğŸŒ ICO ends Dec 30, 2018
Body: Important announcementâ€Šâ€”â€ŠeLYQD ICO extended by 90 days    Dear eLYQD community,  As the market was in a bearish trend during our entire crowdsale period, we have made a difficult but necessary decision to extend our ICO. After many suggestions from token holders and consultations with project advisors, we have decided that it is in the best interest of the project to extend the ICO by further 90 days commencing after initial end date on 30th of September 2018.  The recent fluxes in the crypto market took a toll on the value of Bitcoin, Ethereum and many other cryptocurrencies and the celebratory phase came to a major halt. This, following a series of other such unfortunate events, held the interested stakeholders from investing in the eLYQD ICO, which is denominated in fiat exchanges instead of cryptocurrencies. For example, 1 ETH is equal to 1000 tokens, but if ETH drops by 50%, you get only 50% of the estimated tokens.  The community and supporters of the eLYQD have brought this matter to light and eLYQD has taken note of the same. Given the current volatility in the markets and the increasing demand for LYQD tokens, the eLYQDâ€™s management team has henceforth decided to extend the sale period.  We will restructure the token values from the beginning by giving an equal opportunity to everyone, who could not avail the tokens in the initial crowdfunding rounds due to the declining crypto market conditions.  The ICO will be extended by 90 days after the initial end date to have time to continue marketing & pursuing investments/partnerships.  As the market is gradually recovering from massive price declines that were experienced in Q3 2018 and investor confidence is slowly creeping in. We believe this extension in the current market uptrend will help us achieve the aim of the ICO.  New ICO end date = 30th December 2018, 23:00 PM UTC or until the hard cap is reached.  We say a big thank you for your understanding and support up until this point and beyond.  Regards, eLYQD Team

Title: ğŸ“£ğŸŒ[ANN] A Vaping Industry Powered by BlockchainğŸ“£ğŸŒ ICO ends Dec 30, 2018
Body: Hello usercryptomany, We enjoy reading your queries as they are really challenging and it makes us more determined in delivering the most accurate information keeping our business model in focus.  Q. What is the benefit for the investor if he buys your token? A. We would love to say 'the sky is the limit', but let's be realistic. There isn't any product or service that hasn't been invented already. We are not trying to reinvent the wheel here. We analyzed the vaping industry in depth, used its performance data to better understand the market, the consumers, the products, the manufacturers and the pricing/transaction structure. We discovered the weak links in the chain and improvised and integrated the decentralized blockchain element into the mix and created a completely new business model. To make matters more lucrative, there isn't any other vaping industry marketplace out there in the crypto world. Hence, we can confidently say that this is the biggest benefit (incentive) for an investor when there is no competition out there.  Q. What will be the growth of your token? A. That's what it all boils down to at the end of the day really! If you are a long-term holder or a day trader, the green candles on the chart are a welcome sight. But who can predict if the value of the token price will rise or fall? We assure you that we can't foresee the future, but we are determined to make sure hard work will bear fruit in the end. There are many elements that control the outcome of an ICO from its initial launch to getting listed on an exchange. a) Token supply: Token cap, token buyback, token creation by 3rd party/project. b) Token demand: Services offered - logistics, loyalties, feedbacks, discounts, promotions, referrals etc. c) Market size: Projecting the growth of a business model is based on current numbers. The core of this estimation is taking a transaction (customer pays token, manufacturer provides service) and scaling it up. Let's process this via an example: A manufacturer showcases their product in the eLYQD marketplace, selling an e-liquid bottle for $10, and the customer has to buy it in "LYQD tokens", which they can exchange on any P@P exchanges. The manufacturer expects to sell at least 500 bottles of that e-liquid flavor per month based on the demographics. To determine the product market size, manufacturer calculates (items sold * price), so (500 *12 * $10) = a market size of $60,000 yearly for the first year on one product/flavor.  Coming back to the topic of 'Will the LYQD token rise in value after it's ICO?' Investing always has associated risks attached to it, and it will never be risk-free. Our ICO is a less risky project that has a disclosed market size bottom-up, with a product that is an in-demand commodity and favorable for crypto adoption.
